citations.narrative:
The facility is not following their Program of Vet Care (PVC) as written by the Attending Veterinarian for vaccinations. The
PVC prescribes for adult dogs to receive the rabies, distemper, and parvovirus vaccines every year after a booster at 1
year of age. None of the 25 adult dogs are up to date on these three vaccines. The last recorded date of vaccination was
October 27, 2023.
Failure to follow the PVC for vaccination scheduling leaves the dogs susceptible to diseases, which, if contracted, would
cause pain, distress, and suffering. Correct by administering all of the vaccines required by the Animal Welfare Act
(distemper, parvovirus, and rabies) in accordance with a schedule approved by the Attending Veterinarian and vaccine
manufacturer recommendations. Correct by: July 30, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The facility is not following their Program of Vet Care (PVC) as written by the Attending Veterinarian for vaccinations. The 
PVC prescribes for adult dogs to receive the rabies, distemper, and parvovirus vaccines every year after a booster at 1 
year of age. None of the 25 adult dogs are up to date on these three vaccines. The last recorded date of vaccination was 
October 27, 2023.  
 
Failure to follow the PVC for vaccination scheduling leaves the dogs susceptible to diseases, which, if contracted, would 
cause pain, distress, and suffering. Correct by administering all of the vaccines required by the Animal Welfare Act 
(distemper, parvovirus, and rabies) in accordance with a schedule approved by the Attending Veterinarian and vaccine 
manufacturer recommendations. Correct by: July 30, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
